title: Shiggy
lyrics:
You just need to say it
If you don't got time for me
You can't make somethin' out of nothin'
Let's wrap it all up, it's time to leave
Is it something I said, or did?

I know, beggars can't be choosers

And all I know is enough

For me, for you

Put your money where your mouth is



Eyes peer up from the surface

And you don't got time for me

Anyone can see that this ain't your purpose

Let's wrap it all up and set us free



Is it something I've done? Or won't?

I know, beggars can't be choosers

And all I know is alright

For me, for you

Put your money where your mouth is



Yeah, I've got a new idea

Why don't you stay right here?

Make yourself comfortable

Take the front row when in front of a mirror

Love sympathy, no I don't think so (Don't think)

No empathy is not enough to drink so (So drink)

Don't mention me

You're so interesting

Admission of guilt like an entrance fee



Pick up the phone

If nobody's home

I'm the one you want (Yeah, uh)

All you think about

Keep it in your mouth

But it's written down (Uh, yeah)



You're so insecure

But I'm so far from here

I'm thinking up all the texts you won't send

Little three dots don't disappear
